answers.answer: i don't know i ask my dad he said' i don't think so'  ok :)
Give a recruiter a call. There are waivers for all sorts of things, medical waivers included.
In the United States, unfortunately, your diabetes precludes you from enlisting in any of the armed services.

question: I am a type one diabetic and have been for 15years now. i have always wanted to be in the army. So, my question is can i be in the military at all weather it is behind a computer screen or as a medica can i be in the military at all?
title: can i be in the military at all?
